dict.acceptation: 外国的，外交的；外来的；不相干的；[医]异质的；

sent.orig: Foreign-funded enterprises and foreign enterprises may simultaneously use a foreign language.
sent.trans: 外商投资企业和外国企业可以同时使用一种外国文字。

sent.orig: Class foreign teachers began to keep track of foreign teachers and foreign teachers teaching evaluation service.
sent.trans: 外教上课开始，外教持续跟踪服务及外教教学评估。

sent.orig: Other foreign currency assets. In this sense, foreign exchange is the foreign currency assets.
sent.trans: 其他外汇资产。从这个意义上说外汇就是外币资产。

sent.orig: Approved Contracted Foreign Capital and Foreign Capital Actually Used only included Foreign Direct Investment from 2003.
sent.trans: 自2003年起批准合同外资金额和实际使用外资金额只包括外商直接投资部分。

sent.orig: The British Foreign Secretary is the minister who looks after foreign affairs.
sent.trans: 英国外交大臣是主管外事的部长。
